highlights.description: Text-to-Speech (TTS) provider with streaming support and LLM integration

added.description: TTS provider implementing `tts.Provider` and `tts.StreamingProvider` interfaces
`Synthesize` method for non-streaming TTS via Deepgram REST API
`SynthesizeStream` method for streaming TTS via Deepgram WebSocket API
`SynthesizeFromReader` method for streaming LLM output directly to TTS
`ListVoices` method returning available Deepgram Aura voices
`GetVoice` method for voice lookup by ID
Automatic sentence splitting for natural speech synthesis
Support for TTS output formats: mp3, linear16, mulaw, alaw, opus, flac
Configuration converter from OmniVoice `SynthesisConfig` to Deepgram options
Static voice list with 17 Aura voices (Aura 1 and Aura 2)
TTS conformance tests using omnivoice `providertest` package
STT conformance tests using omnivoice `providertest` package

fixed.description: STT provider initialization uses `sync.Once` to prevent flag redefinition panic

documentation.description: README updated with TTS usage examples and feature tables
PRD.md updated with TTS implementation status
TRD_TTS.md technical design document for TTS implementation
ROADMAP.md tracking planned features (STT Batch) and completed items

tests.description: Unit tests for TTS config conversion functions
Unit tests for TTS provider methods
Unit tests for sentence splitting logic

highlights.description: OmniVoice STT provider for Deepgram with real-time streaming transcription support

added.description: Streaming STT provider implementing `stt.StreamingProvider` interface
Real-time transcription via Deepgram WebSocket API
Support for telephony audio formats: mu-law, a-law, linear16, FLAC, Opus, MP3
Interim and final transcription results with word-level timing
Speech start/end detection via `SpeechStarted` and `UtteranceEnd` callbacks
Speaker diarization support with configurable max speakers
Keyword boosting for domain-specific vocabulary
Configuration converter from OmniVoice `TranscriptionConfig` to Deepgram options

documentation.description: README with installation, usage examples, and configuration reference
Package documentation with streaming transcription examples
